sides.title: "Chopper"
sides.ability: Action: Spend 1 non-recurring [Charge] from another equipped upgrade to recover 1 shield. Action: Spend 2 shields to recover 1 non-recurring [Charge] on an equipped upgrade.

sides.title: "Genius"
sides.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you have not dropped or launched a device this round, you may drop 1 bomb.

sides.title: R2 Astromech
sides.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 [Charge] and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

sides.title: R2-D2
sides.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 [Charge] and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

sides.title: R3 Astromech
sides.ability: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object. After you perform a [Lock] action, you may acquire a lock.

sides.title: R4 Astromech
sides.ability: Decrease the difficulty of your speed 1-2 basic maneuvers ([Turn Left], [Bank Left], [Straight], [Bank Right], [Turn Right]).

sides.title: R5 Astromech
sides.ability: Action: Spend 1 [Charge] to repair 1 facedown damage card. Action: Repair 1 faceup Ship damage card.

sides.title: R5-D8
sides.ability: Action: Spend 1 [Charge] to repair 1 facedown damage card. Action: Repair 1 faceup Ship damage card.

sides.title: R5-P8
sides.ability: While you perform an attack against a defender in your [Front Arc], you may spend 1 [Charge] to reroll 1 attack die. If the rerolled result is a [Critical Hit], suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage.

sides.title: R5-TK
sides.ability: You can perform attacks against friendly ships.

sides.title: Heavy Laser Cannon
sides.ability: Attack: After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all [Critical Hit] results to [Hit] results.

sides.title: Ion Cannon
sides.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, spend 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result to cause the defender to suffer 1 [Hit] damage. All remaining [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

sides.title: Jamming Beam
sides.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, all [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

sides.title: Tractor Beam
sides.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, all [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

sides.title: Os-1 Arsenal Loadout
sides.ability: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, you can still perform [Torpedo] and [Missile] attacks against targets you have locked. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during the attack. Add [Torpedo] and [Missile] slots.

sides.title: Pivot Wing (Closed)
sides.ability: While you defend, roll 1 fewer defense die. After you execute a [0 [Stationary]] maneuver, you may rotate your ship 90˚ or 180˚. Before you activate, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Pivot Wing (Open)
sides.ability: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Servomotor S-foils (Closed)
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, roll 1 fewer attack die. Before you activate, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Servomotor S-foils (Open)
sides.ability: Before you activate, you may flip this card.

sides.title: Xg-1 Assault Configuration
sides.ability: While you have exactly 1 disarm token, uou can still perform [Cannon] attacks. While you perform a [Cannon] attack while disarmed, roll a maximum of 3 attack dice. Add [Cannon] slot.

sides.title: "Chopper"
sides.ability: During the Perform Action step, you may perform 1 action, even while stressed. After you perform an action while stressed, suffer 1 [Hit] damage unless you expose 1 of your damage cards.

sides.title: "Zeb" Orrelios
sides.ability: You can perform primary attacks at range 0. Enemy ships at range 0 can perform primary attacks against you.
At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0-1. If you do, you gain 1 calculate token unless that ship chooses to gain 1 stress token.

sides.title: 4-LOM
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, after rolling attack dice, you may name a type of green token. If you do, gain 2 ion tokens and, during this attack, the defender cannot spend tokens of the named type.

sides.title: Admiral Sloane
sides.ability: After another friendly ship at range 0-3 defends, if it is destroyed, the attacker gains 2 stress tokens. While a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs an attack against a stressed ship, it may reroll 1 attack die.

sides.title: Agent Kallus
sides.ability: Setup: Assign the Hunted condition to 1 enemy ship. While you perform an attack against the ship with the Hunted condition, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Hit] result.

sides.title: Baze Malbus
sides.ability: While you perform a [Focus] action, you may treat it as red. If you do, gain 1 additional focus token for each enemy ship at range 0-1 to a maximum of 2.

sides.title: Boba Fett
sides.ability: Setup: Start in reserve. At the end of Setup, place yourself at range 0 of an obstacle and beyond range 3 of an enemy ship.

sides.title: C-3PO
sides.ability: Before rolling defense dice, you may spend 1 calculate token to guess aloud a number 1 or higher. If you do, and you roll exactly that many [Evade] results, add 1 [Evade] result. Adter you perform the [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

sides.title: Cad Bane
sides.ability: After you drop or launch a device, you may perform a red [Boost] action.

sides.title: Captain Phasma
sides.ability: At the...

sides.title: Cassian Andor
sides.ability: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 1-2 and guess aloud a bearing and speed, then look at that ship's dial. If the chosen ship's bearing and speed match your guess, you may set your dial to another maneuver.

sides.title: Chewbacca
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 2 [Charge] to repair 1 faceup damage card.

sides.title: Chewbacca
sides.ability: At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 1 focus token to repair 1 of your faceup damage cards.

sides.title: Ciena Ree
sides.ability: After you perform a [Coordinate] action, if the ship you coordinated performed a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action, it may gain 1 stress token to rotate 90˚.

sides.title: Cikatro Vizago
sides.ability: During the End Phase, you may choose 2 [Illicit] upgrades equipped to friendly ships at range 0-1. If you do, you may exchange these upgrades. End of Game: Return all [Illicit] upgrades to their original ships.

sides.title: Darth Vader
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc at range 0-2 and spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship suffers 1 [Hit] damage unless it chooses to remove 1 green token.

sides.title: Death Troopers
sides.ability: During the Activation Phase, enemy ships at range 0-1 cannot remove stress tokens.

sides.title: Director Krennic
sides.ability: Setup: Before placing forces, assign the Optimized Prototype condition to another friendly ship.

sides.title: Emperor Palpatine
sides.ability: While another friendly ship defends or performs an attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to modify 1 of its dice as though that ship had spent 1 [Force].

sides.title: Freelance Slicer
sides.ability: While you defend, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend a lock you have on the attacker to roll 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker gains 1 [Jam] token. Then, on a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, gain 1 [Jam] token.

sides.title: GNK "Gonk" Droid
sides.ability: Setup: Lose 1 [Charge]. Action: Recover 1 [Charge]. Action: Spend 1 [Charge] to recover 1 shield.

sides.title: Grand Inquisitor
sides.ability: After an enemy ship at range 0-2 reveals its dial, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform 1 white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

sides.title: Grand Moff Tarkin
sides.ability: During the System Phase, you may spend 2 [Charge]. If you do, each friendly ship may acquire a lock on a ship that you have locked.

sides.title: Hera Syndulla
sides.ability: You can execute red maneuvers even while stressed. After you fully execute a red maneuver, if you ahve 3 or more stress tokens, remove 1 stress token and suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

sides.title: IG-88D
sides.ability: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 upgrade. After you perform a [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.

sides.title: ISB Slicer
sides.ability: During the End Phase, enemy ships at range 1-2 cannot remove jam tokens.

sides.title: Informant
sides.ability: Setup: After placing forces, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the Listening Device condition to it.

sides.title: Jabba the Hutt
sides.ability: During the End Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0-2 and spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, that ship recovers 1 [Charge] on 1 of its equipped [Illicit] upgrades.

sides.title: Jyn Erso
sides.ability: If a friendly ship at range 0-3 would gain a focus token, it may gain 1 evade token instead.

sides.title: Kanan Jarrus
sides.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 fully executes a white maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to remove 1 stress token from that ship.

sides.title: Ketsu Onyo
sides.ability: At the start of the End Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 0-2 in your firing arc. If you do, that ship does not remove its tractor tokens.

sides.title: L3-37
sides.ability: Setup: Equip this side faceup. While you defend, you may flip this card. If you do, the attack must reroll all attack dice.

sides.title: L3-37's Programming
sides.ability: If you are not shielded, decrease the difficulty of your bank ([Bank Left] and [Bank Right]) maneuvers.

sides.title: Lando Calrissian
sides.ability: After you roll dice, you may spend 1 green token to reroll up to 2 of your results.

sides.title: Lando Calrissian
sides.ability: Action: Roll 2 defense dice. For each [Focus] result, gain 1 focus token. For each [Evade] result, gain 1 evade token. If both results are blank, the opposing player chooses focus or evade. You gain 1 token of that type.

sides.title: Latts Razzi
sides.ability: While you defend, if the attacker is stressed, you may remove 1 stress from the attacker to change 1 of your blank/[Focus] results to an [Evade] result.

sides.title: Leia Organa
sides.ability: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 3 [Charge]. During this phase, each friendly ship reduces the difficulty of its red maneuvers.

sides.title: Magva Yarro
sides.ability: After you defend, if the attack hit, you may acquire a lock on the attacker.

sides.title: Maul
sides.ability: After you suffer damage, you may gain 1 stress token to recover 1 [Force]. You can equip "Dark Side" upgades.

sides.title: Minister Tua
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if you are damaged, you may perform a red [Reinforce] action.

sides.title: Moff Jerjerrod
sides.ability: During the System Phase, you may spend 2 [Charge]. If you do, choose the [1 [Bank Left]], [1 [Straight]], or [1 [Bank Right]] template. Each friendly ship may perform a red [Boost] action using that template.

sides.title: Nien Nunb
sides.ability: Decrease the difficulty of your bank maneuvers [[Bank Left] and [Bank Right]].

sides.title: Novice Technician
sides.ability: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then, on a [Hit] result, expose 1 damage card.

sides.title: Perceptive Copilot
sides.ability: After you perform a [Focus] action, gain 1 focus token.

sides.title: Qi'ra
sides.ability: While you move and perform attacks, you ignore all obstacles that you are locking.

sides.title: R2-D2
sides.ability: During the End Phase, if you are damaged and not shielded, you may roll 1 attack die to recover 1 shield. On a [Hit] result, expose 1 of your damage cards.

sides.title: Sabine Wren
sides.ability: Setup: Place 1 ion, 1 jam, 1 stress, and 1 tractor token on this card. After a ship suffers the effect of a friendly bomb, you may remove 1 ion, jam, stress, or tractor token from this card. If you do, that ship gains a matching token.

sides.title: Saw Gerrera
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage to change all of your [Focus] results to [Critical Hit] results.

sides.title: Seasoned Navigator
sides.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

sides.title: Seventh Sister
sides.ability: If an enemy ship at range 0-1 would gain a stress token, you may spend 1 [Force] to have it gain 1 jam or tractor token instead.

sides.title: Supreme Leader Snoke
sides.ability: During the System... you may...

sides.title: Tactical Officer
sides.text: In the chaos of a starfighter battle, a single order can mean the difference between a victory and a massacre.

sides.title: Tobias Beckett
sides.ability: Setup: After placing forces, you may choose 1 obstacle in the play area. If you do, place it anywhere in the play area beyond range 2 of any board edge or ship and beyond range 1 of other obstacles.

sides.title: Unkar Plutt
sides.ability: After you partially excute a maneuver, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage to perform 1 white action.

sides.title: Zuckuss
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, if ou are not stressed, you may choose 1 defense die and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the defender must reroll that die.

sides.title: Bomblet Generator
sides.ability: Bomb During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to drop a Bomblet with the [1 [Straight]] templete. At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 shield to recover 2 [Charge].

sides.title: Conner Nets
sides.ability: Mine During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to drop a Conner Net using the [1 [Straight]] template. This card's [Charge] cannot be recovered.

sides.title: Proton Bombs
sides.ability: Bomb During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to drop a Proton Bomb using the [1 [Straight]] template.

sides.title: Proximity Mines
sides.ability: Mine During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to drop a Proximity Mine using the [1 [Straight]] template. This card's [Charge] cannot be recovered.

sides.title: Seismic Charges
sides.ability: Bomb During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to drop a Seismic Charge with the [1 [Straight]] template.

sides.title: Heightened Perception
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, engage at initiative 7 instead of your standard initiative value this phase.

sides.title: Instinctive Aim
sides.ability: While you perform a special attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to ignore the [Focus] or [Lock] requirement.

sides.title: Sense
sides.ability: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 ship at range 0-1 and look at its dial. If you spend 1 [Force], you may choose a ship at range 0-3 instead.

sides.title: Supernatural Reflexes
sides.ability: Before you activate, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on your action bar, suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

sides.title: Agile Gunner
sides.ability: During the End Phase, you may rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator.

sides.title: BT-1
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result for each stress token the defender has.

sides.title: Bistan
sides.ability: After you perform a primary attack, if you are focused, you may perform a bonus [Single Turret Arc] attack against a ship you have not already attacked this round.

sides.title: Bossk
sides.ability: After you perform a primary attack that misses, if you are not stressed, you must receive 1 stress token to perform a bonus primary attack against the same target.

sides.title: Dengar
sides.ability: After you defend, if the attacker is in your firing arc, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, roll 1 attack die unless the attacker chooses to remove 1 green token. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, the attacker suffers 1 [Hit] damage.

sides.title: Ezra Bridger
sides.ability: After you perform a primary attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a bonus [Single Turret Arc] attack from a [Single Turret Arc] you have not attacked from this round. If you do and you are stressed, you may reroll 1 attack die.

sides.title: Fifth Brother
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Force] to change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Critical Hit] result.

sides.title: Finn
sides.ability: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the enemy is in your [Front Arc], you may add 1 blank result to your roll... ..can be rerolled or otherwise...

sides.title: Greedo
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] to change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result. While you defend, if your [Charge] is active, the attacker may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

sides.title: Han Solo
sides.ability: During the Engagement Phase, at initiative 7, you may perform a [Single Turret Arc] attack. You cannot attack from that [Single Turret Arc] again this round.

sides.title: Han Solo
sides.ability: Before you engage, you may perform a red [Focus] action.

sides.title: Hotshot Gunner
sides.ability: While you perform a [Single Turret Arc] attack, after the Modify Defense Dice step, the defender removes 1 focus or calculate token.

sides.title: Luke Skywalker
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 [Force] to rotate your [Single Turret Arc] indicator.

sides.title: Skilled Bombardier
sides.ability: If you would drop or launch a device, you may use a template of the same bearing with a speed 1 higher or lower.

sides.title: Special Forces Gunner
sides.ability: ...e you perform a primary [Front Arc] attack, ...your [Single Turret Arc] is in your [Front Arc], you may roll 1 additional attack die. ...er you perform a primary [Front Arc] attack, ...our [Single Turret Arc] is in your [Rear Arc], you may perform a bonus primary [Single Turret Arc] attack.

sides.title: Veteran Tail Gunner
sides.ability: After you perform a primary [Front Arc] attack, you may perform a bonus primary [Rear Arc] attack.

sides.title: Veteran Turret Gunner
sides.ability: After you perform a primary attack, you may perform a bonus [Single Turret Arc] attack using a [Single Turret Arc] you did not already attack from this round.

sides.title: Cloaking Device
sides.ability: Action: Spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Cloak] action. At the start of the Planning Phase, roll 1 attack die. On a [Focus] result, decloak or discard your cloak token.

sides.title: Contraband Cybernetics
sides.ability: Before you activate, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, until the end of the round, you can perform actions and execute red maneuvers, even while stressed.

sides.title: Deadman's Switch
sides.ability: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0-1 suffers 1 [Hit] damage.

sides.title: Feedback Array
sides.ability: Before you engage, you may gain 1 ion token and 1 disarm token. If you do, each ship at range 0 suffers 1 [Hit] damage.

sides.title: Inertial Dampeners
sides.ability: Before you would execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 shield. If you do, execute a white [0 [Stationary]] instead of the maneuver you revealed, then gain 1 stress token.

sides.title: Rigged Cargo Chute
sides.ability: Action: Spend 1 [Charge]. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1 [Straight]] template.

sides.title: Barrage Rockets
sides.ability: Attack ([Focus]): Spend 1 [Charge]. If the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 or more [Charge] to reroll that many attack dice.

sides.title: Cluster Missiles
sides.ability: Attack ([Lock]): Spend 1 [Charge]. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0-1 of the defender, ignoring the [Lock] requirement.

sides.title: Concussion Missiles
sides.ability: Attack ([Lock]): Spend 1 [Charge]. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0-1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

sides.title: Homing Missiles
sides.ability: Attack ([Lock]): Spend 1 [Charge]. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1 [Hit] damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

sides.title: Ion Missiles
sides.ability: Attack ([Lock]): Spend 1 [Charge]. If this attack hits, spend 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result to cause the defender to suffer 1 [Hit] damage. All remaining [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

sides.title: Proton Rockets
sides.ability: Attack ([Focus]): Spend 1 [Charge].

sides.title: Ablative Plating
sides.ability: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

sides.title: Advanced SLAM
sides.ability: After you perform a [Slam] action, if you fully executed that maneuver, you may perform a white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

sides.title: Afterburners
sides.ability: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Boost] action, even while stressed.

sides.title: Electronic Baffle
sides.ability: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage to remove 1 red token.

sides.title: Engine Upgrade
sides.text: Large military forces such as the Galactic Empire have standardized engines, but individual pilots and small organizations often replace the power couplings add thrusters, or use high-performance fuel to get extra push out of their engines.

sides.title: Hull Upgrade
sides.text: For those who cannot afford an enhanced shield generator, bolting additional plates onto the hull of a ship can serve as an adequate substitute.

sides.title: Munitions Failsafe
sides.ability: While you perform a [Torpedo] or [Missile] attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1 [Charge] you spent as a cost for the attack.

sides.title: Shield Upgrade
sides.text: Deflector shields are a substantial line of defense on most starships beyond the lightest fighters. While enhancing a ship's shield capacity can be costly, all but the most confident or reckless pilots see the value in this sort of investment.

sides.title: Static Discharge Vanes
sides.ability: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0-1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead.

sides.title: Stealth Device
sides.ability: While you defend, if your [Charge] is active, roll 1 additional defense die. After you suffer damage, lose 1 [Charge].

sides.title: Tactical Scrambler
sides.ability: While you obstruct an enemy ship's attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

sides.title: Advanced Sensors
sides.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may perform 1 action. If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

sides.title: Collision Detector
sides.ability: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles. After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1 [Charge] to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

sides.title: Fire-Control System
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

sides.title: Trajectory Simulator
sides.ability: During the System Phase, if you would drop or launch a bomb, you may launch it using the [5 [Straight]] template instead.

sides.title: Composure
sides.ability: After you fail an action, if you have no green tokens, you may perform a [Focus] action.

sides.title: Crack Shot
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1 [Charge] to cancel 1 [Evade] result.

sides.title: Daredevil
sides.ability: While you perform a white [Boost] action, you may treat it as red to use the [1 [Turn Left]] or [1 [Turn Right]] template instead.

sides.title: Debris Gambit
sides.ability: While you perform a red [Evade] action, if there is an obstacle at range 0-1, treat the action as white instead.

sides.title: Elusive
sides.ability: While you defend, you may spend 1 [Charge] to reroll 1 defense die. After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1 [Charge].

sides.title: Expert Handling
sides.text: While heavy fighters can often be coaxed into a barrel roll, seasoned pilots know how to do it without putting undue stress on their craft or leaving themselves open to attack.

sides.title: Fanatical
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not shielded, you may change 1 [Focus] result to a [Hit] result.

sides.title: Fearless
sides.ability: While you perform a [Front Arc] primary attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the defender's [Front Arc], you may change 1 of your results to a [Hit] result.

sides.title: Heroic
sides.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you have only blank results and have 2 or more results, you may reroll any number of your dice.

sides.title: Intimidation
sides.ability: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

sides.title: Juke
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender's [Evade] results to a [Focus] result.

sides.title: Lone Wolf
sides.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, you may spend 1 [Charge] to reroll 1 of your dice.

sides.title: Marksmanship
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

sides.title: Outmaneuver
sides.ability: While you perform a [Front Arc] arrack, if you are not in the defender's firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

sides.title: Predator
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you may reroll 1 attack die.

sides.title: Ruthless
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender. If you do, that ship suffers 1 [Hit] damage and you may change 1 of your die results to a [Hit] result.

sides.title: Saturation Salvo
sides.ability: While you perform a [Torpedo] or [Missile] attack, you may spend 1 charge from that upgrade. If you do, choose two defence dice. The defender must reroll those dice.

sides.title: Selfless
sides.ability: While another friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage to cancel 1 [Critical Hit] result.

sides.title: Squad Leader
sides.ability: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

sides.title: Swarm Tactics
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

sides.title: Trick Shot
sides.ability: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

sides.title: Advanced Optics
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 focus token to change 1 of your blank results to a [Hit] result.

sides.title: Hyperspace Tracking Data
sides.ability: Setup: Before placing forces, you may... 0 and 6...

sides.title: Primed Thrusters
sides.ability: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform [Barrel Roll] and [Boost] actions even while stressed.

sides.title: Targeting Synchronizer
sides.ability: While a friendly ship at range 1-2 performs an attack against a target you have locked, that ship ignores the [Lock] attack requirement.

sides.title: Andrasta
sides.ability: Add [Device] slot.

sides.title: Black One
sides.ability: After you perform a [Slam] acion, lose 1 [Charge]. Then, you may gain 1 ion token to remove 1 disarm token. If your [Charge] is inactive, you cannot perform the [Slam] action.

sides.title: Dauntless
sides.ability: After you partially execute a maneuver, you may perform 1 white action, treating that action as red.

sides.title: Ghost
sides.ability: You can dock 1 attack shuttle or Sheathipede-class shuttle. Your docked ships can deploy only from your rear guides.

sides.title: Havoc
sides.ability: Remove [Crew] slot. Add [Sensor] and [Astromech] slots.

sides.title: Hound's Tooth
sides.ability: 1 Z-95 AF4 headhunter can dock with you.

sides.title: IG-2000
sides.ability: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 upgrade.

sides.title: Lando's Millennium Falcon
sides.ability: 1 Escape Craft may dock with you. While you have an Escape Craft docked, you may spend its shields as if they were on your ship card. While you perform a primary attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack die.

sides.title: Marauder
sides.ability: While you perform a primary [Rear Arc] attack,, you may reroll 1 attack die. Add [Gunner] slot.

sides.title: Millennium Falcon
sides.ability: While you defend, if you are evading, you may reroll 1 defense die.

sides.title: Mist Hunter
sides.ability: Add [Cannon] slot.

sides.title: Moldy Crow
sides.ability: Gain a [Front Arc] primary weapon with a value of "3." During the End Phase, do not remove up to 2 focus tokens.

sides.title: Outrider
sides.ability: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die. After you fully execute a maneuver, if you moved through or overlapped an obstacle, you may remove 1 of your red or orange tokens.

sides.title: Phantom
sides.ability: You can dock at range 0-1.

sides.title: Punishing One
sides.ability: When you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Front Arc], roll 1 additional attack die. Remove [Crew] slot. Add [Astromech] slot.

sides.title: ST-321
sides.ability: After you perform a [Coordinate] action, you may choose an enemy ship at range 0-3 of the ship you coordinated. If you do, acquire a lock on that enemy ship, ignoring range restrictions.

sides.title: Shadow Caster
sides.ability: After you perform an attack that hits, if the defender is in your [Single Turret Arc] and your [Front Arc], the defender gains 1 tractor token.

sides.title: Slave I
sides.ability: After you reveal a turn, ([Turn Left] or [Turn Right]) or bank ([Bank Left] or [Bank Right]) maneuver, you may set your dial to the maneuver of the same speed and bearing in the other direction. Add [Torpedo] slot.

sides.title: Virago
sides.ability: During the End Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a red [Boost] action. Add [Modification] slot.

sides.title: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
sides.ability: Attack ([Lock]): Spend 1 [Charge]. Change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

sides.title: Ion Torpedoes
sides.ability: Attack ([Lock]): Spend 1 [Charge]. If this attack hits, spend 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result to cause the defender to suffer 1 [Hit] damage. All remaining [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

sides.title: Proton Torpedoes
sides.ability: Attack ([Lock]): Spend 1 [Charge]. Change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

sides.title: Dorsal Turret
sides.ability: Attack

sides.title: Ion Cannon Turret
sides.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, spend 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result to cause the defender to suffer 1 [Hit] damage. All remaining [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.
